1.0.name: wordpress/genesis-layout-extras
1.0.description:
Among the Top 7 most downloaded Genesis plugins ever :) Thank you!

With this lightweight plugin for the popular Genesis Framework you can very easily modify the (registered) default layouts for homepage, singular pages (for posts and pages), various archive sections, author pages, attachment pages, search results pages, the 404 page - all done via a new theme options page. Just look for it at the submenu: Genesis > Layout Extras.

Version 2.0.0 is a complete rewrite regarding code optimizations and also new features: The plugin now optionally adds up to nine (9!) additional layouts. Also, you can optionally add Layouts meta box support for post types inpost screens which don't have it yet. Plus, Genesis Archive Settings for post types could be enabled as well.

As a smart bonus the plugin also includes the layout setting for the bbPress 2.x forum p
